# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2021-07-15

### Added
- üìà Historical performance tracking with SQLite database backend
- Trend analysis with linear regression
- Performance report generation
- Optimization recording and tracking
- Database persistence for long-term performance monitoring
- Complete production-ready v1.0.0 release

### Changed
- Updated to production/stable status
- Enhanced documentation with comprehensive examples

## [0.6.0] - 2021-04-15

### Added
- üéØ Bottleneck detection and highlighting system
- Multi-metric analysis (time, memory, call frequency)
- Severity classification (critical, high, medium, low)
- Visual reporting with color-coded priorities
- Automatic optimization recommendations
- Bottleneck summary statistics

## [0.5.0] - 2021-01-15

### Added
- üìä Before/after comparison system
- Side-by-side function comparison
- Percentage improvement calculations
- Statistical analysis for optimization validation
- JSON export functionality
- Comprehensive comparison summaries

## [0.4.0] - 2020-10-15

### Added
- üí° Auto-optimization suggestion engine
- Pattern-based code analysis
- AST-based optimization detection
- Impact categorization (high, medium, low)
- Profile-based suggestions
- Detailed recommendation reporting

## [0.3.0] - 2020-07-15

### Added
- üîç Line-by-line performance profiling
- Execution count tracking per line
- Memory allocation per line analysis
- Hotspot detection and identification
- Time percentage calculation per line
- Line-level statistics with sys.settrace

## [0.2.0] - 2020-04-15

### Added
- üíæ Memory profiling capabilities with psutil
- Real-time memory usage tracking
- Peak memory detection
- Memory change monitoring
- System memory information
- Memory profiling decorator

## [0.1.0] - 2020-01-15

### Added
- Initial project structure and core profiler
- Basic performance profiling decorator
- Execution time tracking
- Call statistics (min, max, average)
- Simple profiling results display
- Foundation for future features
